tasks.title: Dynamic OG Image Generation
tasks.description: Parent task: Replace static build-time OG image generation with dynamic server-side OG image generation using satori WASM on Cloudflare Workers.

tasks.title: Install WASM dependencies and configure Vite for Cloudflare WASM bundling
tasks.description:
Install WASM variants of satori and resvg for Cloudflare Workers runtime. Add @resvg/resvg-wasm, yoga-wasm-web to dependencies, move satori to dependencies. Configure Vite for WASM bundling on Cloudflare.

Files to modify:
- apps/dotdev/package.json

Acceptance criteria:
- WASM dependencies installed
- pnpm check passes

tasks.title: Create OG theme constants and image generation utilities
tasks.description:
Create apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/theme.ts with OG_WIDTH, OG_HEIGHT, OG_COLORS, OG_FONT_URL constants. Create apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/generate.ts with generateOgImage(element) pipeline using satori WASM and resvg WASM. Create apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/wasm.d.ts for ambient WASM type declarations.

Files to create:
- apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/theme.ts
- apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/generate.ts
- apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/wasm.d.ts

Acceptance criteria:
- generateOgImage accepts JSX element and returns Promise<Uint8Array>
- pnpm check passes

tasks.title: Create OG image JSX components for each page type
tasks.description:
Create apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/components.tsx with three satori-compatible JSX components: HomeOgImage, BlogIndexOgImage, BlogPostOgImage. All use inline styles only (satori requirement) and OG_COLORS from theme.ts.

Files to create:
- apps/dotdev/src/lib/og/components.tsx

Acceptance criteria:
- Three components exported
- pnpm check passes

tasks.title: Create wildcard server route for OG image generation
tasks.description:
Create apps/dotdev/src/routes/og/$.ts with GET handler for dynamic OG image generation. Parse splat params: /og/ → HomeOgImage, /og/blog → BlogIndexOgImage, /og/blog/[slug] → BlogPostOgImage. Unknown routes return 404. Set Cache-Control headers.

Files to create:
- apps/dotdev/src/routes/og/$.ts

Acceptance criteria:
- Route serves PNG images for valid paths
- 404 for unknown paths
- pnpm check passes

tasks.title: Update meta tags to use dynamic OG image URLs
tasks.description:
Update META_IMAGE in __root.tsx from /og-image.png to /og/. Add head functions to blog/$slug.tsx and blog/index.tsx with per-page og:image, og:title, og:description, og:url, twitter:* tags.

Files to modify:
- apps/dotdev/src/routes/__root.tsx
- apps/dotdev/src/routes/blog/$slug.tsx
- apps/dotdev/src/routes/blog/index.tsx

Acceptance criteria:
- All pages reference dynamic OG image URLs
- pnpm check passes

tasks.title: Remove old static OG image generation
tasks.description:
Delete apps/dotdev/scripts/og-image.tsx (old build-time generator) and apps/dotdev/public/og-image.png (static output). Remove @resvg/resvg-js from devDependencies (no longer needed). Clean up any remaining references.

Files to delete:
- apps/dotdev/scripts/og-image.tsx
- apps/dotdev/public/og-image.png

Files to modify:
- apps/dotdev/package.json

Acceptance criteria:
- No references to og-image.png remain
- pnpm check passes
